text:
[Verse]
Night sky shining bright
Little stars take their flight
Wish upon a shooting light
Dreams so high in the night

[Verse]
Up above twinkling eyes
Magic dance in the skies
Hearts are lifted so high
Faithful dreams never die

[Chorus]
Shooting stars here they come
Bringing light to everyone
Close your eyes make a wish
Catch the magic swift swish

[Verse]
Moon is glowing white
Bringing calm to the night
Feeling light feeling free
Underneath the galaxy

[Bridge]
Stars align in our view
Painting skies bright and blue
Hold my hand let's believe
In the dreams we conceive

[Chorus]
Shooting stars here they come
Bringing light to everyone
Close your eyes make a wish
Catch the magic swift swish
title: Shooting Stars
